evidence.claim: AMT utilizes AWS for cloud services, indicating a robust infrastructure for development.
The company adheres to HIPAA standards in its technology solutions, ensuring patient data privacy and security.
RestorixHealth uses FHIR standards for health data interoperability, facilitating improved patient care.
X12 transaction sets are utilized within AMT's EDI processes, streamlining billing operations.
The company implements Kafka for real-time data streaming, enhancing its data processing capabilities.

icp.icp_reason: Engages in X12 transactions and values API automation in healthcare.
